Dear DAVI Member:
As a part of the materials you receive as a member of DAVI,
we are enclosing your free copy of the following publications:
1. National Tape Recording Catalog, Second Edition, 76 pp,
1957, $1.00. This catalog contains information on
over 1000 selected educational tape programs available
to schools and is the result of the excellent work
being performed for DAVI members by the Radio and
Recordings Committee of DAVI-AERT. DAVI is able to
make these tapes available to you through the cooper¬
ation of Kent State University,
2. Telling Your A-V Story. This is the first publication
of the Audio-Visual Commission on Public Information.
DAVI is a participant in this Commission. This publi¬
cation was prepared by Dr. Charles F. Schuller of
Michigan State University, is duplicated by NAVA, and
distributed through EFLA. Additional copies of this
publication are available through the address given on
the back cover.
We hope you will all enjoy these publications and find them
useful in your own professional growth.
Cordially,
Floyde E. Brooker
Executive Secretary
